Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Server

Class ServerMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Server.ServerMessageHandler
public class ServerMessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
ServerMessageHandler Class handles the majority of interactions held between the Client and the Server.

Attributes:

  • int "attempt": keeps count of the client's attempt at reconnecting to the server
  • Debugger "DEBUGGER": debugger for ServerMessageHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerMessageHandler

      public ServerMessageHandler()

  • Method Details

    • nameRequest

      public boolean nameRequest​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      nameRequest is the first interaction the server has with the client, it asks for its name and validates it If a game is not running the client is asked to proceed to the Lobby for further setup of the game If a game is running the client can resume its game.

      Method also handles special cases like reconnection with Server and persistence reconnections

      Parameters:
      serverConnection - the server connection
      Returns:
      true if the client has to show the lobby false if the client has to skip directly to the game

    • waitingForPlayers

      public void waitingForPlayers​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      This is the lobby in which a player can wait for other people to join or launch the Param Modifier or try to start the game once enough players are in there
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.

    • initialPhase

      public void initialPhase​(ServerConnection serverConnection) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Handles the initial phase Server-Client interaction. Clients choose their initial leader cards and resources while simultaneously waiting for each other.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if an error occurs while a Thread waits

    • initialLeaderCards

      public void initialLeaderCards​(ServerConnection serverConnection) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Handles the initial choice of leader cards Server-Client interaction. Clients choose their initial leader cards and resources while simultaneously waiting for each other.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if an error occurs while a Thread waits

    • initialResources

      public void initialResources​(ServerConnection serverConnection) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Handles the initial choice of resources Server-Client interaction. Clients choose their initial leader cards and resources while simultaneously waiting for each other.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if an error occurs while a Thread waits

    • sendError

      public void sendError​(ServerConnection serverConnection, java.lang.String string)
      Sends an error to the client via its socket.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.
      string - error to be sent to the client.

    • isLobby

      public boolean isLobby()
      Checks if the server status is set to LOBBY or PARAM
      Returns:
      true if the game is in lobby phase.

    • nameInsert

      public boolean nameInsert​(ServerConnection serverConnection, java.lang.String name)
      nameInsert checks if the username is already set in the server, if not the name is inserted into the server
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - the reference to the serverConnection
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the name is not in the server, false if somebody has the same name

    • nameOk

      public boolean nameOk​(ServerConnection serverConnection, java.lang.String name)
      nameOk checks if the username is in the server
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - the reference to the serverConnection
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if the name is in the server, false otherwise

    • freeSpace

      public boolean freeSpace​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      freeSpace checks if there's space in the Lobby
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - the reference to the serverConnection
      Returns:
      true if there's free space to join, false otherwise

    • reconnection

      public void reconnection​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      Handles a client's reconnection.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.

    • serverConnectionLeave

      public void serverConnectionLeave​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      Removes a connection from all dependencies with the Server.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.

    • nameInServerLeave

      public void nameInServerLeave​(ServerConnection serverConnection)
      Closes a Client-Server connection.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - connection used to get the Server and operate on the Controller.
